title: Phoenix Wright Trilogy Soundtracks
description:
Ace Attorney, known in Japan as Gyakuten Saiban (????, lit. "Turnabout Trial"), is a series of adventure/visual novel games in which players assume the role of a defense attorney in a fictional courtroom setting, which is based on the Japanese legal system, to strive to find their clients "not guilty" using investigation, evidence, and cross-examination to prove their case.

Includes the OSTs for Ace Attorney, Justice For All, and Trials and Tribulations, as well as the Turnabout Orchestra, Turnabout Jazz Soul, and Magical Trick Society&#039;s CADENZA, plus a few other sound bites I found.
